content: Analyze the duplicate key constraint issue in employee_bonus_incentive and employee_statutory_compliance tables
Identify where INSERT queries are used in save_employee_configs for both bonus_and_incentives and pt_and_lwf configs
Replace INSERT with INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE for employee_bonus_incentive table
Replace INSERT with INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE for employee_statutory_compliance table
Verify that duplicate key scenarios are handled properly without errors
